PISTOL.strategy: **2-1-2 Setup**: 2 players A (pit/site), 1 player mid (catwalk), 2 players B (tunnels/site). Mid player calls rotations.
**Aggressive Mid**: 3 players mid (catwalk/xbox), 1 player A, 1 player B. Mid players push for picks through doors.
**Stack A**: 3 players A site (pit, car, default), 2 players mid/B. Focus on A retakes, mid rotates fast.
**Catwalk Hold**: 2 players A, 2 players mid (catwalk control), 1 player B. Mid players hold aggressively.
**Anti-Rush A**: 3 players A (close angles), 1 player mid, 1 player B. A players crossfire long rushes.
**Rotational**: 1 player A, 2 players mid, 2 players B. Mobile defense, fast rotates based on contact.
**Tunnels Stack**: 2 players A, 1 player mid, 2 players tunnels/B. Heavy tunnels control, force long plays.
**Long Control**: 2 players A (pit focus), 2 players mid, 1 player B. Pit player AWP/rifle for picks.
**B Heavy**: 1 player A, 2 players mid, 2 players B. Force long A plays, fast rotates with utility.
**Info Play**: 2 players A, 1 player mid, 2 players B. Conservative angles, information gathering focus.

ECO.strategy: **Stack A Close**: 4 players A site (close angles), 1 player B. Upgraded pistols, close-range trades.
**Aggressive Mid**: 3 players mid with upgraded pistols, 2 players save. Mid players push doors/catwalk.
**B Stack Save**: 1 player A (save), 4 players B/tunnels close angles. Upgraded pistols B, overwhelm area.
**Catwalk Push**: 2 players A, 3 players mid (catwalk push). Mid players armor+pistol, aggressive contact.
**Anti-Force A**: 3 players A close, 2 players mid/B save. A players upgraded pistols, crossfires.
**Full Save**: All save completely. 2 A, 1 mid, 2 B. Passive angles, survival focus.
**Tunnels Push**: 2 players A, 2 players mid, 1 player tunnels (push). Tunnels player upgraded pistol.
**Long Control**: 2 players A (pit push), 2 players mid, 1 player B save. Pit player upgraded pistol.
**Retake Focus**: 2 players A, 1 player mid, 2 players B. All save, retake utility coordination.
**Mixed Buy**: 2 players A (1 upgraded), 2 players mid (1 upgraded), 1 player B save.

HALF_BUY.strategy: **Rifle Mid**: 2 players A (1 rifle), 2 players mid (1 rifle), 1 player B (SMG). Rifles long angles.
**A Heavy**: 3 players A (2 rifles, 1 SMG), 1 player mid (rifle), 1 player B (SMG). Strong A hold.
**Catwalk Control**: 2 players A (SMGs), 3 players mid (2 rifles, 1 SMG). Mid rifles control catwalk.
**Anti-Execute**: 2 players A (1 rifle), 2 players mid (1 rifle), 1 player B (SMG). Rifles long, SMGs retake.
**Tunnels Rifle**: 2 players A (SMGs), 2 players mid (1 rifle), 1 player B (rifle tunnels). Tunnels rifle control.
**Balanced**: 2 players A (1 rifle, 1 SMG), 2 players mid (1 rifle, 1 SMG), 1 player B (rifle).
**B Heavy**: 2 players A (SMGs), 1 player mid (rifle), 2 players B (1 rifle, 1 SMG). Strong B defense.
**Long Rifle**: 2 players A (1 rifle long), 2 players mid (1 rifle), 1 player B (SMG). Long rifle picks.
**Aggressive Mid**: 2 players A (SMGs), 3 players mid (2 rifles push). Mid rifles take map control.
**Retake Setup**: 2 players A (1 rifle), 1 player mid (rifle), 2 players B (1 rifle, 1 SMG).

FULL_BUY.strategy: **Standard 2-1-2**: 2 players A (rifles), 1 player mid (AWP), 2 players B (rifles). AWP catwalk/long.
**A Heavy**: 3 players A (rifles + utility), 1 player mid (rifle), 1 player B (rifle). Strong A defense.
**Mid Control**: 2 players A (rifles), 3 players mid (AWP + 2 rifles). Heavy mid presence, fast rotations.
**Catwalk Deny**: 2 players A (rifles), 2 players mid (rifles + utility), 1 player B (rifle). Smoke doors.
**Anti-Split**: 2 players A (rifles), 2 players mid (rifles), 1 player B (rifle + utility). Split defense.
**AWP Long**: 2 players A (1 AWP long, 1 rifle), 2 players mid (rifles), 1 player B (rifle). Long AWP picks.
**Tunnels Control**: 2 players A (rifles), 1 player mid (rifle), 2 players B (rifles + utility). Heavy tunnels utility.
**B Stack**: 1 player A (rifle), 2 players mid (rifles), 2 players B (rifles). Force long plays.
**Retake Heavy**: 2 players A (rifles), 1 player mid (rifle), 2 players B (rifles + utility). Retake focus.
**Aggressive Setup**: 2 players A (rifles), 2 players mid (rifles push), 1 player B (rifle). Mid map control.

PISTOL.strategy: **Long A Rush**: All 5 players buy armor, rush long A with coordinated pop-flashes. Clear pit/car quickly.
**B Tunnels Rush**: 4 players rush B tunnels with armor and flashes, 1 player long A for late rotate.
**Mid Control**: 3 players mid (1 with smoke for doors), 2 players long A. Mid players smoke doors, take catwalk.
**A Split**: 2 players long A, 3 players mid to catwalk. Long players smoke car, coordinate timing.
**Short Rush**: 4 players mid to short with pop-flashes, 1 player tunnels. Short players smoke doors.
**B Default**: 2 players tunnels, 2 players mid, 1 player long A. Play for picks and information.
**Catwalk Control**: 3 players mid with utility, 2 players long A. Mid players smoke doors, take catwalk.
**Long Fake to B**: 3 players make noise long A with utility, 2 players position mid. Execute B after rotations.
**Upper Tunnels**: 3 players upper tunnels with utility, 2 players long A. Tunnels players use pop-flashes.
**Anti-Stack**: 2 players long A, 2 players tunnels, 1 player mid. Create pressure from multiple angles.

ECO.strategy: **Five-Seven Long Rush**: Everyone buys Five-Seven + armor. Rush long A together with pop-flashes.
**Stack B Tunnels**: All 5 players stack B tunnels. Buy upgraded pistols + armor. Play close angles.
**Mid Lurk**: 1 player lurks mid with upgraded pistol, 4 players force buy long A.
**Deagle Mid**: 2 players buy Deagle + armor mid, 3 players support. Deagles take long angles through doors.
**Tunnels Control**: 4 players buy armor + upgraded pistols tunnels, 1 player saves.
**Anti-Force Long**: 3 players buy armor + Five-Seven long A, 2 players save. Force players smoke car.
**Short Contact**: 2 players buy armor + upgraded pistols mid/short, 3 players save.
**Catwalk Control**: 3 players buy armor + upgraded pistols mid, 2 players save. Fight for catwalk.
**Split Save**: 2 players force long A, 2 players force tunnels, 1 player saves mid.
**Full Save**: All players save completely. 2 long A, 2 tunnels, 1 mid. Exit frags only.

HALF_BUY.strategy: **Long Control**: 3 players buy rifles, 2 players SMGs. 2 rifles long A, 1 rifle mid, SMGs support.
**Mid Presence**: 2 rifles mid, 2 SMGs long A, 1 rifle tunnels. Mid rifles smoke doors, take catwalk.
**Tunnels Take**: 2 rifles tunnels, 2 SMGs mid, 1 rifle long A. Tunnels rifles clear upper, take B.
**Catwalk Control**: 3 players mid (2 rifles, 1 SMG), 2 SMGs long A. Mid players smoke doors.
**Pick Heavy**: Spread rifles for picks. 1 rifle long A, 1 rifle mid, 1 rifle tunnels, 2 SMGs floating.
**Long Focus**: 4 players long A (2 rifles, 2 SMGs), 1 rifle mid. Long players smoke car.
**Short Split**: 2 rifles mid, 2 SMGs long A, 1 rifle tunnels. Execute A split through short and long.
**Anti-Full Buy**: 2 rifles long angles, 3 SMGs close angles. Use utility to isolate duels.
**Upper Control**: 2 rifles tunnels, 2 SMGs mid, 1 rifle long A. Tunnels rifles take upper control.
**Utility Heavy**: 2 rifles, 3 SMGs with heavy utility. Rifles key angles, SMGs support.

FULL_BUY.strategy: **A Execute**: Smoke car + default, flash over smokes. 3 players long A, 2 players short.
**Mid Control**: 3 players mid with full utility, 2 players long A. Mid players smoke doors + catwalk.
**B Split**: 2 players tunnels, 3 players mid to B. Smoke doors + B site, flash over smokes.
**Catwalk Take**: 4 players mid, 1 player long A. Mid players smoke doors + xbox, take catwalk.
**Default Setup**: 2 long A, 2 mid, 1 tunnels. AWPer mid or long, riflers support.
**A Fake to B**: 3 players make noise long A with utility, 2 players position mid. Execute B.
**Long Control**: 4 players long A with full utility, 1 player mid lurk. Long players smoke car + pit.
**Upper Execute**: 4 players tunnels with full utility, 1 player mid. Tunnels players smoke upper + site.
**Anti-Stack A**: Heavy utility on long A, 4 players execute A site. 1 player mid watches rotations.
**Late Round B**: Play default until 30 seconds, then all 5 execute B through upper tunnels.
